actor_awards.notes: A versatile character actress with a distinctive voice, often cast as mothers, grandmothers, or eccentrics. She began her career in radio and made a powerful film debut as Lady Macbeth in Orson Welles' adaptation. She was married to actor John McIntire.

filmography.title: Macbeth
filmography.role_description: The ambitious and ruthless wife of Macbeth who goads him into regicide to seize the crown.
filmography.plot: A Scottish lord is convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, leading him down a path of treachery and murder.

filmography.title: The Big Heat
filmography.role_description: The widow of a corrupt cop who uses incriminating documents to blackmail the mob.
filmography.plot: A tough detective takes on a politically influential crime syndicate after the suicide of a fellow officer and the murder of his wife.

filmography.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
filmography.role_description: The wife of the Swedish restaurant owner, a warm and sturdy frontier woman.
filmography.plot: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

filmography.title: The Rescuers
filmography.role_description: The voice of the tough, moonshine-swilling muskrat who helps the mice rescue a kidnapped orphan.
filmography.plot: Two mice from the Rescue Aid Society set out to rescue a little girl kidnapped by an evil pawn shop owner.

filmography.title: The Fox and the Hound
filmography.role_description: The voice of the kind old woman who adopts the orphaned fox Tod.
filmography.plot: A fox and a hound puppy become best friends, but as they grow older, they are forced to become enemies due to their instincts and masters.

filmography.title: Words and Music
filmography.role_description: The mother of lyricist Lorenz Hart in this musical biopic.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized biography of the songwriting partnership of Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart.

filmography.title: No Sad Songs for Me
filmography.role_description: A close friend of the protagonist who is unaware of her terminal illness.
filmography.plot: A woman diagnosed with terminal cancer keeps her condition secret while preparing her husband for life after she is gone.

filmography.title: The Happy Time
filmography.role_description: The practical and grounding mother of the Bonnard family.
filmography.plot: A French-Canadian family in 1920s Ottawa deals with the coming-of-age of their youngest son and the antics of his eccentric uncles.

filmography.title: Hangman's Knot
filmography.role_description: A frontier woman whose home is taken over by Confederate soldiers fleeing a heist.
filmography.plot: Confederate soldiers rob a gold shipment, unaware the war has ended, and are trapped by a posse in a way station.

filmography.title: Two Rode Together
filmography.role_description: A frantic mother desperate to find her son who was abducted by Comanches years earlier.
filmography.plot: A corrupt marshal is pressured into rescuing white captives from the Comanches, facing moral ambiguity along the way.

filmography.title: Mr. Sardonicus
filmography.role_description: The loyal but frightened servant in the eerie castle of the title character.
filmography.plot: A doctor is summoned to a remote castle to treat a man whose face has become frozen in a horrifying grin.

filmography.title: April Love
filmography.role_description: The warm aunt who, along with her husband, takes in their wayward nephew on their horse farm.
filmography.plot: A young man sent to his uncle's farm for rehabilitation finds romance and a love for harness racing.

filmography.title: Tribute to a Bad Man
filmography.role_description: A frontier wife and mother in this western drama starring James Cagney.
filmography.plot: A wealthy rancher who has his own way of dispensing justice finds his authority challenged by a new ranch hand.

filmography.title: 7th Cavalry
filmography.role_description: A character in this western dealing with the aftermath of Custer's Last Stand.
filmography.plot: An officer accused of cowardice volunteers for a burial detail at Little Big Horn to clear his name.

filmography.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat
filmography.role_description: A strong-willed woman who helps defend a fort alongside other women.
filmography.plot: A U.S. Army deserter trains a group of Texas women to defend an abandoned fort against a Comanche attack.

filmography.title: Cloak & Dagger
filmography.role_description: A spy posing as an elderly passenger who passes a secret cartridge to the young protagonist.
filmography.plot: A young boy's fantasy of being a spy becomes reality when he witnesses a murder and is entrusted with top-secret information.

filmography.title: The Horse Whisperer
filmography.role_description: The mother of the horse trainer Tom Booker. This was Nolan's final film role.
filmography.plot: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter hires a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

filmography.title: True Confessions
filmography.role_description: The mother of the two main characters, a priest and a police detective.
filmography.plot: A police detective investigates the murder of a priest in 1940s Los Angeles, uncovering corruption in the church.

filmography.title: Avalanche
filmography.role_description: The mother of the resort owner who gets caught in the disaster.
filmography.plot: A holiday resort in the mountains is threatened by an avalanche caused by a plane crash.

filmography.title: The Manitou
filmography.role_description: A client of the psychic protagonist who is involved in a séance.
filmography.plot: A psychic's girlfriend finds out that a lump on her back is a growing reincarnation of a 400-year-old Native American demon.

filmography.title: Chamber of Horrors
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow in Baltimore who becomes a target for the killer.
filmography.plot: A one-handed madman uses various devices to murder the people who forced him to cut off his own hand to escape execution.

filmography.title: A Lawless Street
filmography.role_description: A townswoman in this western about a marshal trying to clean up a lawless town.
filmography.plot: A marshal has cleaned up four towns and now faces his biggest challenge yet in Medicine Bend.

filmography.title: Saddle Tramp
filmography.role_description: A warm-hearted neighbor who helps care for the children.
filmography.plot: A wandering cowboy finds himself the guardian of four children after their father dies.

filmography.title: The Great Dan Patch
filmography.role_description: The wife of the horse's owner in this biopic about the famous racehorse.
filmography.plot: The story of the legendary harness horse Dan Patch, who broke speed records in the early 20th century.

filmography.title: My Blood Runs Cold
filmography.role_description: The aunt of a wealthy heiress who is targeted by a man claiming to be her reincarnated lover.
filmography.plot: A young woman falls for a man who claims they were lovers in a past life, but he has a sinister agenda.
